description: Try our easy to follow Chorizo, Prawn & Pea Pasta recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pasta,Quick & easy dinner,Low saturated fat,High fibre,High protein,Prawn,Low sugar
name: Chorizo, Prawn & Pea Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add chorizo and cook for 4-5 minutes or until golden and crisp. Remove with a slotted spoon, leaving rendered fat in pan.

Over medium heat, add oil to the same pan. Add garlic and chilli, if using, and stir for 1 minute or until soft and just beginning to colour. Add prawns, increase heat to high and cook for 4-5 minutes, stirring often, or until just cooked.
Meanwhile, cook spaghetti in a large saucepan of boiling salted water according to packet instructions or until al dente. Add peas for last minute of cooking. Drain, reserving 1/2 cup cooking water.
Add spaghetti, peas and reserved cooking water to pan with prawns and toss well. Season. Top with chorizo and parsley and serve.
